effect_entries.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Drains half the damage inflicted to heal the user.
effect_entries.short_effect: Drains half the damage inflicted to heal the user.

flavor_text_entries.flavor_text:
An energy-draining
punch. The user’s
HP is restored by
half the damage taken
by the target.

An energy-draining
punch. The user’s
HP is restored by
half the damage taken
by the target.

An energy-draining
punch. The user’s
HP is restored by
half the damage taken
by the target.

Un coup de poing qui draine l’énergie.
Convertit la moitié des dégâts infligés
en PV pour le lanceur.

An energy-draining punch. The user’s
HP is restored by half the damage taken
by the target.

An energy-draining punch. The user’s
HP is restored by half the damage taken
by the target.

こぶしから　あいての　ちからを
すいとる。あたえた　ダメージの
はんぶんの　ＨＰを　かいふく　できる。

주먹으로 상대의 힘을 흡수한다.
입힌 데미지의 절반에
해당하는 HP를 회복할 수 있다.

Un coup de poing qui draine l’énergie.
Convertit la moitié des dégâts infligés en PV pour
le lanceur.

Entzieht dem Ziel Energie. Die Hälfte des
Schadens wird den KP des Anwenders
zugerechnet.

Un golpe que drena energía. El Pokémon recupera
la mitad de los PS arrebatados al objetivo.

Pugno che assorbe energia. Fa recuperare una
quantità di PS pari alla metà del danno inferto.

An energy-draining punch. The user’s
HP is restored by half the damage taken
by the target.

こぶしから　相手の　力を　吸い取る。
与えた　ダメージの
半分の　ＨＰを　回復できる。

こぶしから　あいての　ちからを

從拳頭吸取對手的力量。
可以回復給予對手
傷害的一半ＨＰ。
